content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am sure you will find the apartment to your liking, and I am open to hearing any offer you might have.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my proposal. I appreciate this opportunity. After careful thought, I would like to suggest an agreement at 750 Euro per month. I believe it is a fair and reasonable price for this excellent location and modern apartment. I agree to the price of 750 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
